marklogic.body: You are not pathetic by any means. If you are pathetic then there has got to be some type of support group for people like us! You are going through a very tough time! TTC is a very emotional thing and to top it Off now you have to worry about abnormal pap smears. You deserve to indulge in the stress induced eating AND a Cold beer! Heck, if I lived closer I would come join you! I am going to eat a chocolate chip cookie for breakfast and I will eat one for you too! Sending lots of hugs and prayers!
